text:
<Preparing for the task>

<dimly lit room, anxious character, tension builds>
<anxiety hangs in the air>
Character: *My hands are shaking... I must do this.*

Character: *The noose will hold the axe...*

Character: *No one will notice. Just focus.*

---

<post-preparation, character gathers resolve>
<determination sets in>
Character: *I’ve planned this for weeks.*

Character: *No turning back now...*

Character: *It’s time to act.*

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist ingeniously prepares to conceal an axe under his coat using a noose he designed, demonstrating his troubled state of mind and intentions.
